mapper.select: INSERT INTO signer_lease (signer, owner_id, fencing_token, expires_at) VALUES (#{signer}, #{ownerId}, 1, #{expiresAt}) ON CONFLICT (signer) DO UPDATE SET owner_id = EXCLUDED.owner_id, fencing_token = CASE WHEN signer_lease.expires_at <= #{now} THEN signer_lease.fencing_token + 1 ELSE signer_lease.fencing_token END, expires_at = EXCLUDED.expires_at WHERE signer_lease.expires_at <= #{now} OR signer_lease.owner_id = EXCLUDED.owner_id RETURNING fencing_token
